name: Thermonuclear
storyline: A mega-corporation has resurrected the development of its long-banned 'Allfather' AI technology, thus indirectly provoking the start of the Third World War. 'Thermonuclear' is the name of the most enhanced cyborg ever created, the ultimate weapon your side will use to crush its opponents. Complete strategically significant tasks, upgrade your cyborg, and unlock new skills and artifacts; only this way can you defeat the Allfather and end the war.
summary: Gain control of the ultra-advanced cyborg machine 'Thermonuclear,' and use its abilities to defeat enemy AI and end the disastrous war. In this sci-fi, turn-based strategy game, you can complete unique procedurally generated levels, upgrade and strengthen Thermonuclear and improve your base.
